mapper.insert: insert into app_board(title, content, pwd) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{password})
mapper.select: select board_id as no, title, created_date as createdDate, view_cnt as viewCount from app_board order by board_id desc
select board_id as no, title, content, pwd as password, created_date as createdDate, view_cnt as viewCount from app_board where board_id=#{no}
